Bloodgrass.effect: Can combine with any other Potion Effect ingredient to become food for 1 day.

Primordial Balm.effect: Doubles effect of potion or poison.

Chromus Slime.effect: The final effect after all other calculations is the exact opposite.

Dried Ephedra.effect: Increase the dice-type by 1 size for any healing Effect.

Fennel Silk.effect: Stabilizes body heat to resist cold weather or wet condition penalties for 1 hour.

Gengko Brush.effect: Double the dice rolled of any healing Effect, but divide the total of the dice by 2 (rounding down).

Lavender Sprig.effect: Makes the potion or toxin more stable and safer to craft.

Wyrmtongue Petals.effect: 1d4 + Alchemy Modifier poison damage per round; target is poisoned for 1 minute.

Amanita Cap.effect: Changes any poison Effect to be non-lethal and only incapacitates the target.

Arctic Creeper.effect: Change poison damage to cold or necrotic damage; still considered poison for crafting.

Cactus Juice.effect: Delays poison damage by 5 rounds before taking effect.

Hydrathistle.effect: Used to create potions of Water Breathing.

Fiend\u2019s Ivy.effect: Used to create potions of Mind Reading.

Voidroot.effect: Used to create potions of Flying.
